title: Never Enough
description: Sex, lies, and love…entertainment journalist Catherine Maxwell, aka ‘Cat’, believes in the sex and lies, but life has taught her to leave love out of the equation. She keeps her life and relationships free of commitment, while avoiding anything to do with the corporate world of her father and brothers. Enter rich, high profile attorney Reese Miller, Mr. Alpha Male himself, who sees Cat and has to have her. He won’t take no for an answer.
author: Lisa Renee Jones
